scripts.build: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && bunx tsup && bun run posttsup.ts
scripts.publish:manual: bun buntestsilent && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: bun buntestsilent && npm version minor && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:alpharelease: bun buntestsilent && npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && cd dist && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publish:betarelease: bun buntestsilent && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && cd dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:nextrelease: bun buntestsilent && npm version prerelease --preid=next && cd dist && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:patch: bun buntestsilent && npm version patch && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:premajor: bun buntestsilent && npm version premajor --preid=next && cd dist && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:preminor: bun buntestsilent && npm version preminor --preid=next && cd dist && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:prepatch: bun buntestsilent && npm version prepatch --preid=next && cd dist && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:rcrelease: bun buntestsilent && npm version prerelease --preid=rc && cd dist && npm publish --tag rc
scripts.checksize:core: npx esbuild ./testbundles/bundlecore.js --bundle --outfile=temp-built.js --minify && gzip temp-built.js && stat -f%z ./temp-built.js.gz && rm temp-built.js.*
scripts.checksize:react: npx esbuild ./testbundles/bundlereact.js --bundle --outfile=temp-built.js --minify --external:react --external:@legendapp/state && gzip temp-built.js && stat -f%z ./temp-built.js.gz && rm temp-built.js.*
scripts.checksize: npm run checksize:core && npm run checksize:react
